response.overview: Includes two hours of "never before seen" backstage & live home-made movies, shot during the "Bridge Across Forever Tour" - featuring complete live versions of "Duel With the Devil" and "Shine On You Crazy Diamond", shot from the front row, with no overdubs or studio tweaking. Get inside the dressing rooms for many hilarious and intimate conversations that give you a new glimpse into the band that made some of the most powerful progressive rock music of this generation. Also includes a lost video of TransPacific live in the studio!  Tracks recorded at: 1. Berlin, Germany, November 17, 2001 2. Brussels, Belgium, November 15, 2001 3. Tilburg, Holland, November 12, 2001 4. Berlin, Germany, November 17, 2001 5. Hamburg, Germany, November 16, 2001 6. Karlsruhe, Germany, November 18, 2001 7. Berlin, Germany, November 17, 2001 8. Karlsruhe, Germany, November 18, 2001 9. Dark Horse Studios, Nashville, January 2001
response.title: Transatlantic: The Official Bootleg DVD
